ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry I have to disagree with you. The CS online was always good. If you needed a GM you might have to wait MAYBE up to an hour on a busy day but would get a
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry I have to disagree with you. The CS online was always good. If you needed a GM you might have to wait MAYBE up to an hour on a busy day but would get a GM. Now with the GM pool you can wait days on end and still never get help from one. I have no problem with the cost going up to $12.95 a month but the CS should go up with it or at least stay the same but it has gone down hill. They have become uncaring about the customers. Now they have a pocket pc version,EQ 2,SWG and gods knows what else. They just don't care about the customers anymore and that is just a shame. When they cared more about the customers  you got things like Newbie armor(how long has it been since you have seen any added like they promised?),spells that could be used even if you did not buy the expansion,etc...
----- Original Message -----
From: Justin
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, November 07, 2002 3:40 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging

    Okay I have to step in here.  first of all customer service has always sucked.  I used to call before the stormhammer server went live using the 800 number and it was always busy.  Occasionally i would get through but that was few and far between.  Second of all those who play Stormhammer should get a little more support due to the fact the server cost about $40/month instead of the $12.95/month that you pay or I pay for that matter.  Third have you tried using the live tech support on the web site itself es you may wait a while before someone comes on but when they do they take all the time you need to get your problem solved.  Also if you read the note that was posted on the site you would have seen the reason they rasied the price of the game.  finally I like the game and disagree that the game is going downhill, it is perfectly fine the way it is .  I hate to say this if you don';t likeit so much than why play.

Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
